WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 04 JUL
   BY M/V VANTAGE TOWING SIX 155 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-45.22S 042-44.20W, 24-35.72S 042-22.72W,
   24-34.17S 042-23.52W, 24-43.73S 042-44.97W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 JUL 19.
